    • Method Detail

      • contains

        boolean contains​(java.io.File file)
        Parameters:
        file - A file
        Returns:
        true if the layers for the specified file are in the data store, false otherwise.

      • getFile

        java.io.File getFile​(FeatureSet info)
        Returns the file associated with the specified layer in the data store.
        Parameters:
        info - A layer descriptor
        Returns:
        The file associated with the specified layer or null if the data store does not contain the layer.

      • add

        boolean add​(java.io.File file)
     throws java.io.IOException
        Adds the layers for the specified file to the data store.
        Parameters:
        file - A file
        Returns:
        true if the layers for the file were added, false if no layers could be derived from the file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the data store already contains the layers for the specified file.
        java.io.IOException

      • add

        boolean add​(java.io.File file,
            java.lang.String hint)
     throws java.io.IOException
        Adds the layers for the specified file to the data store.
        Parameters:
        file - A file
        hint - The name of the preferred provider to create the layers, if null any compatible provider will be used.
        Returns:
        true if the layers for the file were added, false if no layers could be derived from the file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the data store already contains the layers for the specified file.
        java.io.IOException

      • remove

        void remove​(java.io.File file)
        Removes all layers derived from the specified file from the data store.

      • update

        boolean update​(java.io.File file)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Updates the layers derived from the specified file.
        Parameters:
        file - The file
        Returns:
        true if the layers were successfully updated, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • update

        boolean update​(FeatureSet featureSet)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Updates the specified layer. Note that if other layers were derived from the same file as the specified layer that they will be updated as well.
        Parameters:
        info - The layer descriptor
        Returns:
        true if the layers were successfully updated, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • queryFiles

        DataSourceDataStoreControl.FileCursor queryFiles()
        Returns all of the files with content currently managed by the data store.
        Returns:
        The files with content currently managed by the data store.

      • setReadOnly

        void setReadOnly​(boolean readOnly)
        Sets the field that determines the default read-only state of future feature sets
        Parameters:
        readOnly - Boolean value indicating whether feature set is read-only
